parts.text: I need to discuss a billing that came in for my husband's phone that we had discontinued account number
I cancelled my services with you in
April
and I just received another statement.
I don't even have services with you anymore, don't send bills my way
Why would you send a statement for a cancelled account?
I cancelled my account
3 months ago
and I just received a bill
Can you help me understand why I received a bill after cancelling my account?
Can you explain why I am still being billed for services after cancelling my account?
Can you provide me with more information about the bill I received after cancelling my account?
What should I do if I receive a bill after cancelling my account?

Why did I receive a bill after cancelling my account?

why am I still being charged for a package even after I terminated my contract?
You keep charging me while I ended my contract in May

three months
